{{cpp/types/type_info/navbar}}
{{ddcl|
virtual ~type_info();
}}

Destructs an object of type {{lc|std::type_info}}. This destructor is public virtual, making the {{lc|std::type_info}} a polymorphic class.

===Notes===
The dynamic type of a {{lc|std::type_info}} subobject may be examined by the {{ltt|cpp/language/typeid}} operator.

It is unspecified whether the implementation calls this destructor for any {{lc|std::type_info}} object at the end of the program.
